text: Reiko Kobayashi (1939-1996, 小林禮子, former name is Reiko Kitani, 木谷禮子) is a Japanese female 7-danShe was promoted to 7-dan from 6-dan in occasion of her death. professional Go player at Nihon Ki-in.Reiko Kobayashi at GoBaseOfficial profile at Nihon Ki-in ==Achievements== Year Notes 1973 and 1975 Obtained the female master title (女流名人) 1967, 1968, 1970, 1980 and 1982 Received the female MVP (棋道賞女流賞) ==Notable family members== Reiko Kobayashi has several professional players in her family. * Father: Minoru Kitani, 9-dan professional go player * Husband: Koichi Kobayashi, 9-dan professional go player, holder of three honorary titlesKoichi Kobayashi at Sensei's LibraryKoichi Kobayashi at GoBase * Daughter: Izumi Kobayashi, former female title holderIzumi Kobayashi at Sensei's LibraryIzumi Kobayashi at GoBase * Son in law: Cho U, 9-dan professional player from TaiwanCho U at Sensei's Library ==References== category:1939 births category:1996 deaths Category:Japanese Go players category:Sportswomen
title: Reiko Kobayashi
